page.title: 10School Dinners
page.content:
Some people like school dinners,some people hate them.... but I like them.Some people don't like the mixtures because we have{chips {fishfingers,cabbage and hot beetroot. The beetroot is hot because of the mixtures around it.The things I like are fishfingers and a burger.The burger with beans and sausage or cheese in.I like hot chocolate pudding because of the melting taste.I hate mashed potatoes because when you pour gravy on,it dissolves like foam from the sea.I have never liked lemon meringue because it is warm and disgusting.We have salad on a cold day and a warm dinner on a warm day.School dinners have a good side and also a bad side.
.
